title: No More Parties in LA
lyrics:
Lyrics
La-di, da-da, da (I like this flavour)
La-da-da-da-di-da, da, la (la)
Let me tell you, I'm out here
From a very faraway place
All for the chance to be a star
Nowhere seems to be too far
No more parties in L.A.
Please, baby, no more parties in L.A., uh
No more parties in L.A.
Please, baby, no more parties in L.A., uh
No more (Los Angeles)
Please (shake that body, party that body)
Please (shake that body, party that body)
Please (shake that body, party that body)
Hey, baby, you forgot your Ray‑Bans
And my sheets still orange from your spray tan
It was more than soft porn for the K‑Man
She remember my Sprinter, said I was in the grape van
Um, well, cutie, I like your bougie booty
Come, Erykah Badu‑me, well, let's make a movie
Hell, you know my repertoire is like a wrestler
I show you the ropes, connect the dots
A country girl in North Hollywood
Mama used to cook red beans and rice (Los Angeles)
Now it's Denny's, four in the morning, spoil your appetite
Liquor pouring and - swarming your section with erection
Smoke in every direction, middle finger pedestrians
R&B singers and lesbians, rappers and managers
Music and iPhone cameras
This - unanimous for you, it's damaging for you, I think
That - should only be holding exclusive rights to me
I mean, he flew you in this - on first class (Los Angeles)
Even went out his way so you could check in an extra bag
Now you wanna divide the yam like it equate the math?
That - don't add up, you're making him mad as -
She say she came out here to find an A‑list rapper (Los Angeles)
I said, "Baby, spin that 'round and say the alphabet backwards"
You're dealing with malpractice (shake that body, party that body)
Don't kill a good -'s confidence
Just 'cause he a nerd (shake that body, party that body)
And you don't know what a - is
The - still good, though
The - still good, though
Make me say, "Nam Myoho Renge Kyo"
Make a - say big words and act lyrical
Make me get spiritual, make me believe in miracles (let me tell you)
Buddhist monks and Cap'n Crunch cereal (I'm out here)
Lord, have mercy, thou will not hurt me (from a very faraway place)
Five buddies all herded up on a Thursday (all for the chance to be a star)
Bottle service, head service, I came in first place (nowhere seems to be too far)
The opportunity, the proper top of breast and booty cheek
The pop community, I mean, these - come with union fee
And I want two of these, moving units through consumer streets
Then my shoe released, she was kickin' in gratuity
And yeah, G, I was all for it (Los Angeles)
She said, "K‑Lamar, you kinda dumb to be a poet" (shake that body, party that body)
I'ma put you on game for the lames (shake that body, party that body)
That don't know they a rookie
Instagram is the best way to promote some - (body)
Scary
Scary
No more parties in L.A.
Please, baby, no more parties in L.A.
Friday night, tryna make it into the city (Los Angeles)
Breakneck speeds, passenger seat, somethin' pretty
Thinking back to how I got here in the first place (shake that body, party that body)
Second‑class - wouldn't let me on first base (shake that body, party that body)
A backpack - with luxury tastebuds (Los Angeles)
And the Louis Vuitton store got all of my pay stubs
Got - from beats I did for - more famous
When did I become A‑list? I wasn't even on a list
Strippers get invited to where they only got hired
When I get on my Steve Jobs, somebody gon' get fired
I was uninspired since Lauryn Hill retired
And 3 Stacks, man, you preaching to the choir
Any rumor you ever heard about me was true and legendary (Los Angeles)
I done got Lewinsky'd and paid secretaries
For all my - with babies by -
That use they kids as meal tickets (shake that body, party that body)
Not knowin' the disconnect from the father (shake that body, party that body)
The next generation will be the real victims
I can't fault 'em, really (Los Angeles)
I 'member Amber told my boy
No matter what happens, she ain't goin' back to Philly
Back to our regularly scheduled programmin'
Of weak content and slow jammin' (let me tell you)
But don't worry, this one's so jammin' (I'm out here)
You know it, L.A., it's so jammin'
I be thinkin' every day (all for the chance to be a star)
Mulholland Drive need to put up some - barricades (nowhere seems to be too far)
I be paranoid every time, the pressure
Da problem ain't I be drivin', the problem is I be textin'
My psychiatrist got kids that I inspired
First song they played for me was 'bout their friend that just died
Textin' and drivin' down Mulholland Drive (Los Angeles)
That's why I'd rather take the 405 (shake that body, party that body)
I be worried 'bout my daughter, I be worried 'bout Kim (shake that body, party that body)
But Saint is baby Ye, I ain't worried 'bout him (shake that body, party that body)
Had my life threatened by best friends with selfish intents
What I'm supposed to do?
Ride around with a bulletproof car and some tints?
Every agent I know know I hate agents
I'm too black, I'm too vocal, I'm too flagrant
Something smellin' like shit, that's the new fragrance (Los Angeles)
It just mean, I do it my way, -
Some days I'm in my Yeezys, some days I'm in my Vans (shake that body, party that body)
If I knew y'all made plans, I wouldn't have popped the - (shake that body, party that body)
I know some fans thought I wouldn't rap like this again (Los Angeles)
But the writer's block is over, emcees, cancel your plans
A thirty‑eight‑year‑old eight‑year‑old with rich - problems
Tell my wife that I hate the Rolls so I don't never drive it
It took six months to get the Maybach all matted out
And my assistant crashed it soon as they backed it out
-! Got a bald fade, I might slam
Pink fur, got Nori dressin' like Cam
Thank God for me (Los Angeles)
Whole family gettin' money, thank God for E
I love rockin' jewelry, a whole neckful
- say he funny and disrespectful
I feel like Pablo when I'm workin' on my shoes (Los Angeles)
I feel like Pablo when I see me on the news
I feel like Pablo when I'm workin' on my house (shake that body, party that body)
Tell 'em party's in here, we don't need to go out (shake that body, party that body)
We need the turbo thots, high speed, turbo thots
Drop, dro-dro-dro-drop, like Robocop
She brace herself and hold my stomach, good, good - do that
She keep pushin' me back, good, good do that (let me tell you)
She push me back when the - go too deep (I'm out here)
This good - put your - to sleep (from a very faraway place)
Get money (all for a chance to be a star)
Big, big money (nowhere seems to be too far)
And as far as real friends, tell all my cousins I love 'em
Even the one that stole the laptop, you dirty -
I just keep on lovin' you, baby
And there's no one else I know can take your pla-, pla-, pla-
Please, no more parties in L.A. (shake that body, party that body)
Please, baby, no more parties in L.A., uh (shake that body, party that body)
No more parties in L.A. (Los Angeles)
Please, baby, no more parties in L.A., uh
No more parties in L.A.
Please, baby, no more parties in L.A., uh
Let me tell you, I'm out here
From a very faraway place
All of the chance to be a star
Nowhere seems to be too far
